ground_truth_bugs.description: Removing float:right from .panel breaks noscript header layout

droid_false_positives.comment: [P1] Fix invalid legacy flexbox `inline-flex` display value - claims -webkit-inline-box is not valid
droid_false_positives.reasoning: -webkit-inline-box IS a valid legacy value recognized by browsers for backward compatibility. Mozilla Bug #1257661 shows it was explicitly added as an alias for inline-flex. The declaration is not ignored.
